Hi,

I am trying to find out how/if Heritrix could be used for my Owark
project (http://owark.org/).

The use case is different from "classical" web archives and their
million pages crawl campaigns: archiving "links" an Owark archiver
performs very small campaigns.

I have downloaded, installed and played with Heritrix and my conclusion
is that I have two obvious options:

      * use Heritrix as a whole and submit Owark's mini campaigns
        through its REST API
      * fork its code or just use its good ideas to design something
        more lightweight.

Between these two extreme options, I am wondering if I could (and how
easy that would be) write some kind of fa√ßade to use its modules as a
library with a different engine.

The modules are clearly separated from the engine in the source tree and
that kind of indicate that the modules can be seen as a library... but
has it already been done and do you have pointers that could help me get
to get started?

Thanks,

Eric
